basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. degree in Accounting and Finance at University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

work.summary: Assist in providing consultant service for 12 clients
highlights: Compile Annual Profit & Loss Statements through Quick Books—retail and construction
Reconcile clients bank statements, matching actual against the recorded amount
Manage business clients’ payrolls using QuickBooks—15 employees in the aggregate

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
